Html:
I know that RAWR says at the beginning that Rawr.Rogue is "Mostly Working", but I am getting VERY different number for Combat Mastery  between Rawr and shadowcraft.  All of the other stats are relatively similar, but Mastery is way outta whack - 0.05 Rawr vs 1.12 Shadowcraft.

 

What am I doing wrong?
